text: With more than 53 million fans on Weibo, the 30-year-old actress is clearly a popular choice to lead the live-action remake set for release in 2019, but who exactly is she and what else has she starred in?
title: Crystal Liu Yifei: seven things you don’t know about the Chinese actress playing Mulan
